articles.author: Seung Min Kim, Michael Balsamo, Chris Megerian
articles.title: Student loan help for millions coming from Biden after delay - The Associated Press
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — President Joe Biden on Wednesday is set to announce his long-delayed move to forgive up to $10,000 in federal student loans for many Americans and extend a pause on payments to January, according to three people familiar with the plan.
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden on Wednesday is set to announce his long-delayed move to forgive up to $10,000 in federal student loans for many Americans and extend a pause on payments to Januar… [+7880 chars]

articles.author: Brenda Goodman, CNN
articles.title: Americans are highly vaccinated against polio. Here's why it could still spread - CNN
articles.description: So far, there's been just one recent case of polio in the United States, which paralyzed a young adult in Rockland County, New York.
articles.content:
(CNN)So far, there's been just one recent case of polio in the United States, which paralyzed a young adult in Rockland County, New York.

articles.title: Calm Down, Rema's Big Hit Receives A Global Makeover - Guardian Nigeria
articles.description: Rema has enlisted the help of American pop star Selena Gomez for the remix of his Calm Down song in an effort to achieve international
articles.content: Rema’s song “Calm Down” shot to a hundred million views on YouTube in less than three months after it was released, making it an immediate hit. The track, made available as one of the songs before hi… [+670 chars]

articles.title: Brendan Fraser to receive TIFF award for upcoming film The Whale - CBC News
articles.description: Canadian-American actor Brendan Fraser will receive an award for his performance in the upcoming film The Whale at this year's Toronto International Film Festival.
